content: unilintu is a triangular top-down shawl/scarf the shape of the shawl is a horizontally wide and vertically shallow triangle alternating garter stitch and eyelet row create a simple stripey texture the pattern can be made with fingering to worsted weight yarn yardage depends on chosen weight of yarn and desired size of shawl the sample shawl was made with malabrigo yarn lace in two colorways paris night and indigo holding two strands of yarn together as one strand the sample shawl has 13 full pattern repeats 13 eyelet row finished measurements after blocking 132 cm 52 wingspan along top edge not including pompoms / 37 cm 14 5 along center stitch the pattern is also available * in french 1 * in hungarian 2 suomenkielinen ohje löytyy täältä 3 1 http //zeknittingbird wordpress com/2014/04/11/leternite-cest-long-surtout-vers-la-fin-chale-unilintu/ 2 http //www gombolyda hu/webshop/minta/ingyenesen-letoltheto-mintak/item/4524-unilintu-kendo html 3 http //unilintushawl blogspot fi/p/suomeksi html
